articles.title: Oil Prices Continue To Slip Even As Crude Oil Inventories Decline - OilPrice.com
articles.description: Crude oil inventories in the United fell this week by 3.939 million barrels, the American Petroleum Institute API data showed on Tuesday, with analysts expecting a 1 million barrel draw
